page.title: 18Tourism, New Galloway
page.content: Tourism provides a high proportion of New Galloway's revenue.There are 4 comfortable,welcoming hotels,many guest houses & licenced restaurant.All visitors are welcomed to participate in the village's clubs & activities. It provides a peaceful and relaxing holiday,catering for bird watchers, anglers, golfers and walkers.All the amenities are in the vicinity-fishing in Loch Ken,Otter Pool(Bennan Forest), Bruce's Stone,Covenanters' Memorial, Deer Park & Museum(Galloway Forest Park),Kenmure Castle(resting place for Mary,Queen of Scots on her travels), a standing stone,(where the last wild boar was reputedly killed),1/2Km.from Ken Bridge. For walkers,there is the recently formed Southern Upland Way, with its panoramic views over South West Scotland.
